name: Rapid Addition
tag_list: fix-protocol, fix-engine, trading-software, financial-service, trading-solutions, low-latency-trading, algorithmic-trading, high-frequency-trading
overview:
Since 2003, Rapid Addition has been the leading software solutions provider to the global electronic marketplace. Our founders comprise some of the best known names in the industry.

A fully independent company, headquartered in the UK with a presence in North America, Asia, and Latin America, Rapid Addition works with many of the leading global financial institutions, including banks, broker-dealers, exchanges, MTFs, Foreign Exchange (FX) houses, and investment managers.

Rapid Addition’s products include the industry’s most consistent low latency FIX and FAST engines and capture the company’s unique insight and extensive experience in the FIX marketplace.
